mapper.select: select projectid, versionid, videocoveruuid, videouuid, Content, idea, imageuuid, projectname, progress, username, userid, versiondate, clicknum, chunum from user, project, version, fork, DescriptionUnit where userid = project_userid and fork_projectid = projectid and version_forkid = forkid and describeunit_versionid = versionid and ismain = 1 and SerialNum = 1 and isagree = 1 and ispin = 1 and userid = #{userID};

select projectid, versionid, videocoveruuid, videouuid, Content, idea, imageuuid, projectname, progress, username, userid, versiondate, clicknum, chunum from user, project, version, fork, DescriptionUnit where userid = project_userid and fork_projectid = projectid and version_forkid = forkid and describeunit_versionid = versionid and ismain = 1 and SerialNum = 1 and isagree = 1 and userid = #{userID};

select projectid, idea, versionid, projectname, progress, username, userid, versiondate, clicknum, chunum from user, project, version, fork, `Favorite&Project` where userid = project_userid and fork_projectid = projectid and version_forkid = forkid and ismain = 1 and isagree = 1 and FP_ProjectID = ProjectID and FP_FavoriteID = #{favoriteID}
mapper.insert: insert into Version(DocumentUUID, VersionDate, VersionNum, PushIntroduce, VideoTittle, VideoUUID, VideoCoverUUID, Version_ForkID, Version_UserID) value (#{documentUUID},#{date},#{versionNum},#{pushIntroduce},#{videoTitle},#{videoUUID},#{coverUUID},#{forkID},#{userID});
mapper.update: update Project set ProjectName=#{projectName}, IsOpen=#{isOpen}, Progress=#{progress}, Idea=#{idea}, VideoCollection=#{videoCollection} where ProjectID = #{projectID};
update project set IsPin=1 where projectID=#{projectID} ;
